topBlocks.title: The Curated Marketplace For RFPs
topBlocks.subTitle: No Negotiating. No Redlines. No Delays.

blocks.title: My vendor cancelled and I need service tomorrow!
blocks.content: Just set your price and post your contract to Light RFP's platform or call a Light RFP account executive to find available vendors ASAP.

blocks.title: My contract renews in 30 days; can I find a better price?
blocks.content: Invite your current vendors to bid on an RFP along with Light RFP's network of vetted vendors to get great service at the best price.

blocks.title: My RFP is complex and confidential. I need an account manager
blocks.content: Our procurement professionals will understand your needs, make a market for private bids, and get your contract signed on your terms.
